docs.abstract: Fiat Chrysler Automobiles reports second-quarter net income of 333 million euros, or about $363 million, up 69 percent from year-earlier period; reports revenue of 29.2 billion euros, or about $31.8 billion, up 25 percent from one year earlier; impressive results drive shares up 7.3 percent.

headline.main: Fiat Chrysler Profit Increases 69%, Most of It From North America

docs.abstract: Entertainment mini-conglomerate Relativity Media files for bankruptcy protection following decade of aggressive expansion; possible buyers for company include flamboyant founder Ryan Kavanaugh.
